title: We need to enable Google Drive Api to access files stored on Google Drive from Android application. To enable Google Drive API, follow below steps:

title: Implement Connection Callbacks and Connection Failed Listener
b

inline_content.Text: Implement Connection Callbacks and Connection Failed Listener

title: We will implement Connection Callbacks and Connection Failed Listener of Google API client in MainActivity.java file to know status about connection of Google API client. These listeners provide
onConnected(), onConnectionFailed(), onConnectionSuspended()
b
method to handle the connection issues between app and Drive.

inline_content.Text: We will implement Connection Callbacks and Connection Failed Listener of Google API client in MainActivity.java file to know status about connection of Google API client. These listeners provide
method to handle the connection issues between app and Drive.

title: If user has authorized the application, the
onConnected()
b
method is invoked. If user has not authorized application,
onConnectionFailed()
b
method is invoked and a dialog is displayed to user that your app is not authorized to access Google Drive. In case connection is suspended,
onConnectionSuspended()
b
method is called.
